affiliation.ce:source-text: Shenyang Aerospace University Automation College, Shenyang 110136, China

head.citation-title: Attitude information fusion method based on extended kalman filter基于扩展Kalman滤波的姿态信息融合方法研究
head.abstracts: © 2020, Science Press. All right reserved.In the magnetic interference environment, when a magnetometer is used to correct the heading of a multi-rotor aircraft based on the quaternion extended Kalman filter, it may cause deviation in terms of attitude and heading estimation. To eliminate the influence of magnetic interference on the attitude angle in the quaternion and reduce the heading deviation of the multi-rotor aircraft, a method based on extended Kalman filter is proposed to estimate the attitude and heading information, respectively. According to the magnetic induction intensity of the geomagnetic field and the angle between the geomagnetic field and gravity, an adjustable measurement noise variance matrix is established to adaptively modify the course of the multi-rotor aircraft, which is based on the magnetic induction intensity of the geomagnetic field and the angle between the geomagnetic field and gravity. Meanwhile, to further improve the attitude estimation accuracy, sensor data output model is formulated and calibrated by using a three-dimensional turntable. Finally, experiments are implemented based on independently developed flight control systems. Experimental results show that the method can provide accurate attitude information for multi-rotor aircraft under magnetic interference environment, and the anti-magnetic interference performance is improved.
